item.title: Heather add a quote by Howard Zinn
item.description: "If history is to be creative, to anticipate a possible future without denying the past, it should, I believe, emphasize new possibilities by disclosing those hidden episodes of the past when, even if in brief flashes, people showed their ability to resist, to join together, occasionally to win. I am supposing, or perhaps only hoping, that our future may be found in the past's fugitive movements of compassion rather than in its solid centuries of warfare." -- Howard Zinn

item.title: Heather add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I love like a leaf in the wind. Please, hold your applause until the end of the performance (the last day of fall)." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Heather add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I would rather sit on a pumpkin, and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion." -- Henry David Thoreau
